column4: What total bullshit, my graphics card is no longer supported or something. Ughh.
language?  and what card do you have?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-nv/+bug/5801 I have a Geforce 4MX (According to the sticker)
then you're SOL I guess :(
How did I get this to work in 8.04?
probably installed the binary drivers from Nvidia and not the ones in the repos
have you tried it?
Of course, through the System > Admin > Hardware Drivers, I have.
download the drivers directly from Nvidia 186.03 I think is the latest version
Will do, where can I download them exactly?
http://www.nividia.com
then go to Download Drivers then select your card and OS
Should I uninstall the auto one?
it should do that for you automagically
you're going to have to be comfy in the CLI because you need to kill gdm and the xserver to install it
Awesome, here's a question, after i kill gdm with sudo killall gdm; how can I start it again?
I use startx, but then - I don't know how to kill that one.
you'll restart the PC after the install
Got it, thanks.
Well, be back in a second, I hope :)
good luck!
